import React from "react"; const tableStyle = { color: "black", border: "1px solid black", padding: "8px", fontFamily: "Arial" }; export const MultiDayWeatherForecast = ({forecast}) => { return (
{forecast.forecastday.map(day => ( ))}
Date Weather Temperature Humidity Max Wind Speed (MPH)
{day.day.date} {day.day.maxtemp_f} F / {day.day.mintemp_f} F {day.day.avghumidity} {day.day.maxwind_mph}
) }
